title: 1. Framing Methods
problem: Implement the data link layer framing methods: character count, character stuffing, and bit stuffing.

title: 2. CRC Computation
problem: Write a program to compute CRC code for CRC-12, CRC-16 and CRC-CCITT.

title: 3. Sliding Window (Go-Back-N)
problem: Implement flow control using the sliding window protocol (Go-Back-N).

title: 4. Dijkstra’s Algorithm
problem: Implement Dijkstra’s algorithm to compute the shortest path through a network.

title: 5. Broadcast Tree
problem: Obtain a broadcast tree for a subnet of hosts.

title: 6. Distance Vector Routing
problem: Implement distance vector routing algorithm for obtaining routing tables.

title: 7. Data Encryption
problem: Implement data encryption and decryption (Caesar Cipher).

title: 8. Leaky Bucket
problem: Write a program for congestion control using Leaky bucket algorithm.

title: 9. Frame Sorting
problem: Write a program for frame sorting technique used in buffers.
